General.Name: Henzhen Zhaowei Machinery And Elect
General.Description: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, designs, manufacture, and sale of precision transmission and micro-drive systems. The company provides smart consumer electronics for sports health, 3C electronics, virtual reality, and beauty products; smart home products for doors and windows, home office, home appliances, and kitchen and bathroom; smart medical products for detection, injection, to clean, and operation; and automotive electronics for smart cockpit, dynamic domain, automotive injection molded parts, and supporting facilities services. It offers industrial equipment for building security, automated manufacturing, detection and measurement, and industrial communication. In addition, it offers security cameras, gas value actuators, drum motors, manipulator joint steering gears, 5G antenna modules, antenna feeder system parts, automatic feeder drive modules, and automatic inspection drive modules. It  serves mobile communication, medical equipment, smart home, smart car, consumer electronics, industrial equipment, and other fields. Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
